meanings.sent1: I stopped by the superettes to grab some milk and bread.
meanings.sent2: The superettes on the corner is convenient for quick grocery runs.
meanings.sent3: At the superettes, I found a tiny shopping cart that made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The superettes was a beacon of light in the neighborhood, offering essentials to all.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sign of the superettes made it stand out among the other shops.

meanings.definition: A small store selling a limited variety of goods.
meanings.sent1: The superettes down the street sells snacks and drinks.
meanings.sent2: People often visit the superettes for last-minute items.
meanings.sent3: I joked with my friend that the superettes must have a secret stash of candy.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of options, the superettes was a hidden gem for unique finds.
meanings.sent5: The superettes had a cozy atmosphere that made shopping there enjoyable.
